item.title: Turn a Blind Eye
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/bullet.md#you-dont-know-what-happened-to-that-kid-you-raised-vyl-wnanory|See our sense of shame and throw it overboard]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/bullet.md#you-dont-know-what-happened-to-that-kid-you-raised-vyl-wnanory|See our moral compass set to so past bored]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/bullet.md#you-dont-know-what-happened-to-that-kid-you-raised-vyl-wnanory|I guess conscience really does just make cowards of us all]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/bullet.
